name: Sky Runner

{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}

Holiday 2024 Update: Gift Drift Mode

From December 18, 2024, through January 28, 2025, take flight with a holiday-themed drone and deliver presents—while steering clear of lumps of coal! Every successful delivery helps unlock bigger and bigger charity contributions for Toys for Tots. Hit certain milestones, and watch the donation grow from 15% all the way up to 50%. It’s an incredible way to spread cheer both in and out of the game!

Mixed Reality...
